docs.snippet: A challenge to the state tax on real-estate transactions of $1 million or more was rejected today by the state's highest court.   The suit was brought by Donald J. Trump, the builder, developer and sports investor, who objected to the tax on his T...
docs.lead_paragraph: A challenge to the state tax on real-estate transactions of $1 million or more was rejected today by the state's highest court. The suit was brought by Donald J. Trump, the builder, developer and sports investor, who objected to the tax on his Trump Tower skyscraper on Fifth Avenue at 56th Street in Manhattan. But the Court of Appeals ruled 4 to 1 that the tax, which Governor Cuomo had urged in his election campaign, was constitutional.

docs.snippet: ELIZA PETRESCU, an eyebrow designer, doesn't stand on ceremony, or even bother with hello. ''We are going to have to let those eyebrows grow!'' she said, greeting a new client who seemed to be expecting a more genial ''good morning.''    But then,...
docs.lead_paragraph: ELIZA PETRESCU, an eyebrow designer, doesn't stand on ceremony, or even bother with hello. ''We are going to have to let those eyebrows grow!'' she said, greeting a new client who seemed to be expecting a more genial ''good morning.'' But then, eyebrow grooming as practiced by Ms. Petrescu is not for the faint of heart. She can strip, pluck and prune brows to bonsai perfection in seven minutes flat. For that skill, clients are willing to overlook a manner that can be as sharp as her flashing metal tweezers.
docs.abstract: Profile of Eliza Petrescu, eyebrow designer at new Avon Centre Spa in Trump Tower, New York City; photo (S)

headline.main: GURU: Eliza Petrescu; Where Eyebrows Go Up and Down On Command
